nodes.text: A speeder truck, also known as a truckspeeder or a repulsortruck, was a type of landspeeder that typically had extra room for cargo or storage. The repulsorcraft was large in comparison to typical landspeeders and speeder bikes, and models included the A-A4B truckspeeder owned by Moloch, as well as the A-A5 Speeder Truck used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Truckspeeders were known for having stronger antigravity generators than the typical landspeeder, but were lacking in acceleration.

When escaping from Imperial scout troopers on Lothal alongside the bounty hunter Bossk with a speeder bike, Ezra Bridger drove into a tunnel in the opposite direction, necessitating him to evade a sanitation repulsortruck amongst other repulsorlift vehicles. Further down the tunnel, Bridger encountered a wide and tall repulsortruck that forced him to swing his speeder close to the tunnel's ceiling to avoid being hit.
The speeder truck first appeared in canon in the 2014 junior novel Ezra's Gamble, written by Ryder Windham.
